title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: UDL Implementation Strategies in Inclusive Early Childhood Education—Vygotsky

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational curriculum design, basic child development theory, and project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three principles of UDL version 3.0 in connection with Vygotsky’s Zone of Proximal Development (ZPD).
Learners can design and validate project-based learning scenarios for inclusive early childhood education environments using a UDL checklist.
Learners can propose three or more UDL-supported strategies to improve social interaction and communication skills based on real-world cases.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
